title: Flicker
description:
Happy Halloween! We thought we’d drop you a special treat to get your day started. 

FLICKER is a story of what happens when you idolize someone a little too much. And you believe what you see on the screen is real.
Just don’t stop moving and never ever let the candle burn out.

Written and narrated by Jed Shepherd with Something Scary podcast co-host Blair Bathory.
Shepherd is the creator of "the scariest movie of the decade", HOST, which he wrote and executive produced.
If you’d like to see FLICKER’s scary artwork, head over to YouTube.com/snarled to see the illustrations of Trevor Henderson in our video.

Kick off the spooky season with a new Something Scary t-shirt! Go to SomethingScary.com for an early Halloween treat and get a 20% discount applied at checkout all month long.
Do you want to connect with other people who love horror and all things Something Scary? Join our new Discord. Join our Patreon and get members only access to our Discord. Go to Patreon.com/snarled
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
